ExportGear.description:
A chunk of the wyrm Fass, collected after his explosive death in the Cambion Drift. Used to attract Glutinox on the surface during Vome, Ostimyr at surface hotspots during Fass, and Vitreospina in caves during Fass/Vome.

Location: Cambion Drift on Deimos while Vome is active
ExportGear.name: Fass Residue

ExportGear.description:
Matter from the body of the Wyrm Fass, purged of toxins, and rendered usefully. Used to attract Aquapulmo and Flagellocanth in Cambion Drift surface hotspots, Aquapulmo only during Vome.

Obtained from Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos).
ExportGear.name: Processed Fass Residue

ExportGear.description:
A gobbet of raw flesh, fallen from the wyrm Vome in her death spasm. Used to attract Chondricord and Duriod in Cambion Drift cave hotspots during Fass and Vome.

Location: Cambion Drift on Deimos while Fass is active
ExportGear.name: Vome Residue

ExportGear.description:
The flesh of Vome, refined, and ready for use. Used to attract Myxostomata in Cambion Drift cave hotspots during Vome.

Obtained from Daughter in the Necralisk (Deimos).
ExportGear.name: Processed Vome Residue

ExportGear.description:
This bait is composed of aromatic tetraxin that is known to attract Mirewinders, a Servofish found in Orb Vallis cave hotspots.

Obtained via The Business in Fortuna (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Mirewinder Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is synthesized from complex hexophenol that is known to attract Charamotes, a Servofish found in Orb Vallis cave hotspots.

Obtained from The Business in Fortuna (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Charamote Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is synthesized from specialized A-disulphex-A compounds that are known to attract Synathid, a legendarily rare Servofish found only in Orb Vallis cave hotspots.

Obtained from The Business in Fortuna (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Synathid Bait

ExportGear.description:
A simple cocktail of short-chain polymers and contaminants. Easily detected by rudimentary Servofish in the Orb Vallis under all conditions, but ignored by more specialized models. Good for Sapcaddies (found in the lake), and Tinks and Brickies (found in ponds).

Obtained from The Business in Fortuna (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Broad-Spectrum Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is synthesized from Methacalcene-1 that is known to attract Krillers, a Servofish found in Orb Vallis lakes during warm weather.

Obtained via The Business in Fortuna (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Kriller Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is synthesized from beryzene that is known to attract Longwinders, a Servofish found in Orb Vallis lake hotspots during warm weather.

Obtained via The Business in Fortuna (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Longwinder Bait

ExportGear.description:
This endochlor/dionium melange attracts both Recasters and Eye-Eyes, Servofish found in Orb Vallis ponds. The Eye-Eye shows up during warm weather and Recasters shows up at Hot Spots during cool weather.

Obtained from The Business in Fortuna (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Narrow-Spectrum Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is synthesized from long-chain LS-74 compounds that are known to attract Tromyzon, a Servofish found in Orb Vallis pond hotspots during cool weather.

Obtained from The Business in Fortuna (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Tromyzon Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is composed of materials that are known to attract Murkrays, a fish found only in Plains of Eidolon ocean hotspots during both day and night.

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth).
ExportGear.name: Murkray Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait attracts predatory fish that are active in the Plains of Eidolon during either day or night.

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Attracts Sharrac and Karkina in the ocean.
ExportGear.name: Twilight Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait attracts fish that are active in the Plains of Eidolon during the day.

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). Attracts Mawfish and Charc Eels in the lake; Khut-Khut, Yogwun, and Mortus Lungfish in ponds; and Goopolla and Tralok in the ocean.
ExportGear.name: Peppered Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is composed of exotic materials that are known to attract the elusive Glappid, a fish found only in Plains of Eidolon ocean hotspots during the night.

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth).
ExportGear.name: Glappid Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is composed of materials that are known to attract Norg, a fish found only in Plains of Eidolon lake hotspots during the night.

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth).
ExportGear.name: Norg Bait

ExportGear.description:
This bait is composed of materials that are known to attract Cuthols, a fish found only in Plains of Eidolon pond hotspots during the night.

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth).
ExportGear.name: Cuthol Bait

ExportGear.description: A peculiar relic from the tomb of Inaros.
ExportGear.name: Sacred Vessel

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Vulpaphyla with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: VULPAPHYLA ECHO-LURE

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Vulpaphyla.
ExportGear.name: VULPAPHYLA PHEROMONE GLAND

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Cryptilex with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: CRYPTILEX ECHO-LURE

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Cryptilex.
ExportGear.name: CRYPTILEX PHEROMONE GLAND

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Avichaea with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: AVICHAEA ECHO-LURE

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Avichaea.
ExportGear.name: AVICHAEA PHEROMONE GLAND

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Nexifera with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: NEXIFERA ECHO-LURE

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Nexifera.
ExportGear.name: NEXIFERA PHEROMONE GLAND

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Predasite with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: Predasite Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Predasite.
ExportGear.name: PREDASITE PHEROMONE GLAND

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Undazoa with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: UNDAZOA ECHO-LURE

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Undazoa.
ExportGear.name: UNDAZOA PHEROMONE GLAND

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Condroc.
ExportGear.name: Condroc Pheromone Oota

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Kuaka.
ExportGear.name: Kuaka Pheromone Oota

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Kubrodon.
ExportGear.name: Kubrodon Pheromone Synthesizer

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Mergoo.
ExportGear.name: Mergoo Pheromone Oota

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Stover.
ExportGear.name: Stover Pheromone Synthesizer

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Bolarola.
ExportGear.name: Bolarola Pheromone Synthesizer

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Sawgaw.
ExportGear.name: Sawgaw Pheromone Synthesizer

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Virmink.
ExportGear.name: Virmink Pheromone Synthesizer

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Horrasque.
ExportGear.name: Horrasque Pheromone Synthesizer

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Pobbers.
ExportGear.name: Pobbers Pheromone Synthesizer

ExportGear.description: Deploy just before using the echo-lure to increase the chance of attracting a rarer subspecies of Vasca Kavat.
ExportGear.name: Vasca Kavat Pheromone Oota

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Condroc with life-like animal calls. Condroc inhabit the Plains of Eidolon.
ExportGear.name: Condroc Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Kuaka with life-like animal calls. Kuaka inhabit the Plains of Eidolon.
ExportGear.name: Kuaka Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Kubrodon with life-like animal calls. The Kubrodon is most often found around the Craters in Orb Vallis.
ExportGear.name: Kubrodon Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Stovers with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: Stover Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Mergoo with life-like animal calls. Mergoo inhabit the Plains of Eidolon.
ExportGear.name: Mergoo Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Bolarola with life-like animal calls. The Bolarola is most often found around the Mountainous areas of Orb Vallis.
ExportGear.name: Bolarola Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Sawgaw with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: Sawgaw Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Virmink with life-like animal calls. The Virmink is most often found around the Lakes in Orb Vallis.
ExportGear.name: Virmink Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Horrasque with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: Horrasque Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Pobbers with life-like animal calls. The Pobbers is most often found around the Mushroom Fields of Orb Vallis.
ExportGear.name: Pobbers Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Tranquilizes animals for the purpose of safe relocation.
ExportGear.name: Tranq Rifle

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby wildlife with life-like animal calls.
ExportGear.name: Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Entice and attract nearby Vasca Kavat with life-like animal calls. Vasca Kavat roam the Plains of Eidolon at night.
ExportGear.name: Vasca Kavat Echo-Lure

ExportGear.description: Field-and-forget, the Beckonsnare emits an ultrasonic frequency enticing to targeted lifeforms. Upon entering they are comfortably contained within a one-way photon fence for easy collection at your convenience.
ExportGear.name: Beckonsnare

ExportGear.description:
Dyes the waters with a compound that sticks to fish passing through it, making them easier to see from the shore.

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth).
ExportGear.name: Luminous Dye

ExportGear.description:
A compound that relaxes nearby fish.

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth).
ExportGear.name: Pharoma

ExportGear.description: Hardens skin, fortifying against damage while restricting movement.
ExportGear.name: Calcifin Stim

ExportGear.description: Coats the target in a film that refracts light, allowing undetected movement.
ExportGear.name: Refract Stim

ExportGear.description: Revives a target that is bleeding out, and provides a bonus revive to any allies in range.
ExportGear.name: Clotra Stim

ExportGear.description: Elevates adrenaline levels to enable faster movement while increasing sensitivity to damage.
ExportGear.name: Adrenal Stim

ExportGear.description: Launch a bright blue flare that significantly increases Affinity Range while active.
ExportGear.name: Fosfor Blau

ExportGear.description: Launch a bright red flare that significantly increases Affinity Range while active.
ExportGear.name: Fosfor Rahd

ExportGear.description: Launch a bright red flare that significantly increases Affinity Range while active.
ExportGear.name: Fosfor Rahd

ExportGear.description: This is a mildly effective antitoxin.
ExportGear.name: Beryl Antitoxin

ExportGear.description: This is a moderately effective antitoxin.
ExportGear.name: Citrine Antitoxin

ExportGear.description: This is a mildly effective antitoxin.
ExportGear.name: Amethyst Antitoxin

ExportGear.description: This is a moderately effective antitoxin.
ExportGear.name: Topaz Antitoxin

ExportGear.description: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.
ExportGear.name: Lapis Antitoxin

ExportGear.description: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.
ExportGear.name: Vermillion Antitoxin

ExportGear.description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.
ExportGear.name: Alpha Corruptor

ExportGear.description: Deploys an ANCIENT PROTECTOR EXIMUS unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Ancient Protector Specter

ExportGear.description: Lures the Stalker out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where the assassin would normally appear.
ExportGear.name: Stalker Beacon

ExportGear.description: Lures the Zanuka Hunter out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where the assassin would normally appear.
ExportGear.name: Zanuka Hunter Beacon

ExportGear.description: Lures the Grustrag Three out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where the assassins would normally appear.
ExportGear.name: Grustrag Three Beacon

ExportGear.description: Lures the Wolf out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where the assassin would normally appear.
ExportGear.name: Wolf Beacon

ExportGear.description: A bombastic symphony of color.
ExportGear.name: Ki'Teer Fireworks

ExportGear.description:
The barbed prongs on this fishing spear make it easier to catch fish with smooth skin. 

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). This spear is most effective on the following Plains of Eidolon fish:
Charc Eel
Cuthol
Goopolla
Murkray
Sharrac
Yogwun
ExportGear.name: A Fishing Spear

ExportGear.description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.
ExportGear.name: Beta Corruptor

ExportGear.description: A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
ExportGear.name: Vapor Specter

ExportGear.description: Deploys a short-lived remote camera that overrides your Warframe optics
ExportGear.name: Remote Observer

ExportGear.description: Deploys a CHARGER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Charger Specter

ExportGear.description: Deploys a clone of Clem to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Clem Clone

ExportGear.description: Deploys a CORRUPTED BOMBARD unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Corrupted Bombard Specter

ExportGear.description: Deploys a CORRUPTED HEAVY GUNNER unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Corrupted Heavy Gunner Specter

ExportGear.description: Deploys a CORRUPTED LANCER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Corrupted Lancer Specter

ExportGear.description: Give unto The Void a generous 100,000 credits.
ExportGear.name: Passionate Void Offering

ExportGear.description: Give unto The Void 10,000 credits.
ExportGear.name: Faithful Void Offering

ExportGear.description: Give unto The Void 1,000 credits.
ExportGear.name: Humble Void Offering

ExportGear.description: Call in a designated crew member for backup in non-Railjack missions.
ExportGear.name: On Call Crew

ExportGear.description: Want a more spectacular fireworks display to show your patriotism? Celebrate in style with this single use consumable item.
ExportGear.name: Grand Finale

ExportGear.description: Celebrate the holiday with fireworks! Light up the sky with this single use consumable item.
ExportGear.name: Starburst

ExportGear.description: When activated, it disrupts a Fomorian core's Omega energy field, making it vulnerable. Also shields Tenno from Omega radiation.
ExportGear.name: Fomorian Disruptor

ExportGear.description: Launches a magnetic prism to display your chosen Glyph. Only one may be deployed at a time, and charges are consumed on use.
ExportGear.name: Glyph Prism

ExportGear.description: Launches a magnetic prism to display your chosen Glyph. Only one may be deployed at a time, and charges are unlimited.
ExportGear.name: Glyph Prism

ExportGear.description: A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
ExportGear.name: Force Specter

ExportGear.description: Specialized trap for attracting and slowing the movement of synthesis targets.
ExportGear.name: Kinetic Siphon Trap

ExportGear.description: Creates 50x Pherliac Pods that releases powerful pheromones to attract the Infested.
ExportGear.name: Pherliac Pods

ExportGear.description:
Plumb the depths with this crafty fishing spear that's barely detectable to Infested and hybrid/Orokin fish. Due to its Infested aspect, it's one of the only known things that can pass through exocrine. 

Obtained from Daughter in the Necralisk. This spear is most effective on fish found in the Cambion Drift (Deimos).
ExportGear.name: Spari Spear

ExportGear.description:
Plumb the depths with this crafty fishing spear that's barely detectable to Infested and hybrid/Orokin fish. Due to its Infested aspect, it's one of the only known things that can pass through exocrine. 

Obtained from Daughter in the Necralisk. This spear is most effective on fish found in the Cambion Drift (Deimos).
ExportGear.name: Ebisu Spear

ExportGear.description: Creates 50x Potent Pherliac Pods that releases powerful pheromones to attract the Infested.
ExportGear.name: Potent Pherliac Pods

ExportGear.description: Injects antiserum into Vaporizers or the user to prevent armor degradation.
ExportGear.name: Antiserum Injector

ExportGear.description: Synthesize a genetic data of the target and uploads it to the Sanctuary.
ExportGear.name: Synthesis Scanner

ExportGear.description: Deploys a SCORPION EXIMUS unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Scorpion Specter

ExportGear.description: A persistent waypoint marker for use with the world map. Coordinate your squad and track places of importance!
ExportGear.name: Loc-Pin

ExportGear.description:
Standard tool for cutting ore and gems out of stone.

Travel far from Hub settlements for the best chance of mining rare minerals.
ExportGear.name: Nosam Cutter

ExportGear.description:
A more accurate variation of the Nosam Cutter.

Travel far from Hub settlements for the best chance of mining rare minerals.
ExportGear.name: Focused Nosam Cutter

ExportGear.description:
Enhanced with cybernetics, this tool is able to locate nearby gems and ore veins and has chance to retrieve Rare Gems on any Landscape.

Travel far from Hub settlements for the best chance of mining rare minerals.
ExportGear.name: Advanced Nosam Cutter

ExportGear.description:
Fast-ignition, high-intensity mining tool capable of extracting the rarest of materials with surgical precision.

Can be used to retrieve Rare Gems on any Landscape. Travel far from Hub settlements for the best chance of mining rare minerals.
ExportGear.name: Sunpoint Plasma Drill

ExportGear.description: Deploys a MOA EXIMUS unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Moa Specter

ExportGear.description: Provokes an immediate confrontation with your Kuva Lich or Sister of Parvos: an insult which cannot be ignored.
ExportGear.name: Requiem Ultimatum

ExportGear.description: A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
ExportGear.name: Cosmic Specter

ExportGear.description: Used to bypass security systems that protect the Razorback's holding cell.
ExportGear.name: Razorback Cipher

ExportGear.description: An Omni is a multi-use Railjack tool for extinguishing fires, grounding electrical hazards, and repairing hull ruptures. Use outside the Railjack to instantly recall back to the ship.
ExportGear.name: Omni

ExportGear.description:
Purpose built to recover Servofish without damage. Delivers a disabling electromagnetic pulse after a successful hit if timed correctly.

Obtained from The Business in Fortuna. This spear is most effective on Servofish found in the Orb Vallis (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Shockprod Fishing Spear

ExportGear.description:
Successful electromagnetic pulses radiate outward also disabling any nearby Servofish.

Obtained from The Business in Fortuna. This spear is most effective on Servofish found in the Orb Vallis (Venus).
ExportGear.name: Stunna Fishing Spear

ExportGear.description: Deploys a ROLLER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Roller Specter

ExportGear.description: Samples a target of interest for later analysis in your Codex (25 charges).
ExportGear.name: Codex Scanner

ExportGear.description: Deploys a SHIELD OSPREY EXIMUS unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Shield Osprey Specter

ExportGear.description: A replicant cloned from a Warframe which can be deployed to assist Tenno on their missions.
ExportGear.name: Phase Specter

ExportGear.description: Deploys a DESERT SKATE unit to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Desert Skate Specter

ExportGear.description:
The barbed prongs on this fishing spear make it easier to catch fish with smooth skin. 

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). This spear is most effective on the following Plains of Eidolon fish:
Charc Eel
Cuthol
Goopolla
Murkray
Sharrac
Yogwun
ExportGear.name: Lanzo Fishing Spear

ExportGear.description:
This fishing spear features a slender blade to puncture armored plates and carapaces. 

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). This spear is most effective on the following Plains of Eidolon fish:
Tralok
ExportGear.name: Tulok Fishing Spear

ExportGear.description:
This fishing spear has multiple blades that allow it to pierce the hides of scaly fish. 

Obtained from Fisher Hai-Luk in Cetus (Earth). This spear is most effective on the following Plains of Eidolon fish:
Glappid
Khut-Khut
Mawfish
Mortus Lungfish
Norg
ExportGear.name: Peram Fishing Spear

ExportGear.description: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.
ExportGear.name: Stable Corruptor

ExportGear.description: Deploys a clone of the Stalker to fight for you.
ExportGear.name: Stalker Specter

ExportGear.description: Show the enemy how much you care with the adorable Eros Arrow skin.
ExportGear.name: Eros Arrow Skin

ExportGear.description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.
ExportGear.name: Sunrise Apothic

ExportGear.description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.
ExportGear.name: Nightfall Apothic

ExportGear.description: Creates an organic compound composed of rare plant species. Effects unknown.
ExportGear.name: Twilight Apothic

ExportGear.description:
Damage is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

Blueprint can be obtained via the Orokin Lab in a Clan Dojo.
ExportGear.name: Extinguished Dragon Key

ExportGear.description:
Health is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

Blueprint can be obtained via the Orokin Lab in a Clan Dojo.
ExportGear.name: Bleeding Dragon Key

ExportGear.description:
Shields are greatly reduced while key is equipped. Full Shield Gate duration is capped at 0.33s.

Blueprint can be obtained via the Orokin Lab in a Clan Dojo.
ExportGear.name: Decaying Dragon Key

ExportGear.description:
Speed is greatly reduced while key is equipped.

Blueprint can be obtained via the Orokin Lab in a Clan Dojo.
ExportGear.name: Hobbled Dragon Key

ExportGear.description: Known as 'lisau heisah' by the Ostrons, this is a traditionally-brewed remedy for the Vasca virus. Once applied any infected Kavats within a short radius are cured.
ExportGear.name: Vasca Curative

ExportGear.description: Single-use device used for auto-hacking the lockdown control panels.
ExportGear.name: Cipher

ExportGear.description: Restores 2x Primary and Secondary Ammo Pick Up Amount every 15s for 60s.
ExportGear.name: Squad Ammo Restore (Medium)

ExportGear.description: Restores Energy to all squad members. Pulses 50 Energy every 5s for 20s.
ExportGear.name: Squad Energy Restore (Medium)

ExportGear.description: Restores Health to all squad members. Pulses 100 Health every 5s for 20s.
ExportGear.name: Squad Health Restore (Medium)

ExportGear.description: Restores Shields to all squad members. Pulses 100 Shield every 7.5s for 30s.
ExportGear.name: Squad Shield Restore (Medium)

ExportGear.description: Summon and instantly mount a Kaithe while in free roam missions.
ExportGear.name: Kaithe Summon

ExportGear.description: Deploy the selected archwing gun in any atmospheric environment using this gear item.
ExportGear.name: Archgun Deployer

ExportGear.description: Summons a K-Drive for use during free roam missions
ExportGear.name: K-Drive Launcher

ExportGear.description: Charges consumed by Landing Craft Air Support.
ExportGear.name: Air Support Charges

ExportGear.description: Restores 2x Primary and Secondary Ammo Pick Up Amount every 15s for 60s.
ExportGear.name: Squad Ammo Restore (Medium)

ExportGear.description: Ordis hacks into enemy systems and disrupts security protocols for a short period.
ExportGear.name: Override

ExportGear.description: Ordis drops bombs in a line from your position to the beacon you placed.
ExportGear.name: Carpet Bomb

ExportGear.description: Creates a whirling mass of energy that violently attracts nearby enemies, crushing their atoms into a tiny spec of matter.
ExportGear.name: Vortex

ExportGear.description: Ordis scans the area for rare items.
ExportGear.name: Orokin Eye

ExportGear.description: Calls Kahl and a retinue of his Brothers to assist you for a limited time. Subsequent uses heal Kahl's squad and add an additional Brother.
ExportGear.name: Kahl Beacon

ExportGear.description: Launches homing missiles
ExportGear.name: Missile Battery

ExportGear.description: Ordis delivers a Med-Tower to restore health to nearby allies.
ExportGear.name: Med-Tower

ExportGear.description: Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.
ExportGear.name: Snow Globe

ExportGear.description: Nora sends enemies to dreamland with a calming tune.
ExportGear.name: Dreamers

ExportGear.description: Ordis delivers an automatic turret that will fire upon nearby visible enemies.
ExportGear.name: Sentry Gun

ExportGear.description: Summon a Necramech to the battlefield.
ExportGear.name: Necramech Summon

ExportGear.description: Summons an Atomicycle for use in 1999 and free roam missions.
ExportGear.name: Atomicycle Summon

ExportGear.description: Summons an Archwing for use during free roam missions.
ExportGear.name: Archwing Launcher

ExportGear.description: A device used to manage coordination and resources during Operation Link missions.
ExportGear.name: OpLink

ExportGear.description: Instantly restores your Health to full.
ExportGear.name: Health Restore (Large)

ExportGear.description: Instantly restores 50 Health.
ExportGear.name: Health Restore (Small)

ExportGear.description: Fully restores all ammo types.
ExportGear.name: Omni Ammo Box
